title: #67 - xQc Reveals Almost Joining 100 Thieves & His Craziest Twitch Ban

description: On this episode of The CouRage and Nadeshot Show podcast, xQc comes onto the show as a guest to talk about the massive Twitch payout leak, how he almost joined 100 Thieves, Overwatch 2, Sh*t Camp, and more!
